sentence.text: A syndrome of brachydactyly (absence of some middle or distal phalanges), aplastic or hypoplastic nails, symphalangism (ankylois of proximal interphalangeal joints), synostosis of some carpal and tarsal bones, craniosynostosis, and dysplastic hip joints is reported in five members of an Italian family.

entity.text: absence of some middle or distal phalanges
synostosis of some carpal and tarsal bones

sentence.text: It may represent a previously undescribed autosomal dominant trait.
